title: FTBUtilities如何修改认领区块数量？
author: illness_emc
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 天辉胡萝卜
replies.txt_content:
illness_emc 发表于 2020-7-7 03:06
修改player段

[player]
default_player_rank: true
power: 1
example.permission: true
example.other_permission: false
example.permission_with_value: 0
ftbutilities.claims.max_chunks: 30
ftbutilities.chunkloader.max_chunks: 15复制代码

ftbutilities.claims.max_chunks是最大声明区块数
ftbutilities.chunkloader.max_chunks是最大加载区块数

replies.author: illness_emc
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
